column2: add ghost mode to tool window properties (IDEABKL-3654)

column3: This patch adds an option 'Ghost mode' to tool panel. With this option enabled strip button for tool window is hidden from docking toolbar.
Below are two screens about it - before and after checking that option in context menu

Windows is still enabled and can be shown via menu View->Tool Windows or any other way.
This patch is actually affects only visibility of strip button.
And the state (if changed from visible to ghost only) is saved in workspace.xml
